body:
In more detail:

"sample column" does not occur in the Rust repository at all, maybe this is actually a failure in the syntax extension (they are displayed as ICEs in the same way)?

Yeah, or they did when I filed this.  There's a subtle question here re: why removing "pub" broke things, but I think this is all superseded by a quote_branch macro which, IIRC, @erickt added a while back.
